trends: There has been one other sighting in Paisley
There were no other sightings in Paisley on or around March 20th 2011
divs: Sighting DetailsThis is the second night in a row I have seen the same thing, last night I saw 2 bright orange spheres in the sky from my kitchen window. one was pure bright the other flashing, very rapid (never seen anything like that before). Tonight I saw one single orange (very bright) sphere high in the sky it was very fast, no more than 5 minutes later a helicopter flew over my house heading in the same direction. My guess is that someone reported it or they knew it was in the air space but it was freaky.... Two nights in a row. Anyway if anyone else has any more reports from Scotland or the Paisley area I would love to hear them. With respect James.
